meanings.definition: A person or machine that pulps something.
meanings.sent1: The pulpers worked tirelessly to turn the fruits into juice.
meanings.sent2: The factory had advanced pulpers to process the paper efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The pulpers in the kitchen were so fast, they could make a smoothie in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her hands moved like pulpers, breaking down the ingredients with ease.
meanings.sent5: The pulpers hummed as they transformed the apples into cider.

meanings.sent1: The pulpers of the machine crushed the tomatoes into a thick paste.
meanings.sent2: He learned the art of pulping to make the perfect sauce.
meanings.sent3: The pulpers in the blender danced around, creating a puree of vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The rain pulpers the fallen leaves into mush on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The pulpers of time turned the once fresh fruit into a soft pulp.
